name: This Rock is in Outer Space
name_original: This Rock is in Outer Space
description:
this rock is in outer space. A short, 3-minute game.

Jump across platforms, drive a space ship and drag and drop things! Oh, and... uh...

yeah that's it. this game was made for a game jam.

cheat if you want. that's the point of the game jam. oh, and also, the game forces you to cheat. nice.

*WARNING* loud noises. if you're wearing headphones/earphones, maybe lower the volume.
